text: Kim Kyung-roul (; 23 February 1980 â€“ 22 February 2015) was a South Korean professional billiards player. He won the 2010 Three-Cushion World Cup. Kim lived in Ilsan, where he died on 22 February 2015, after falling out of his apartment window. He was 34. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1980 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cue sports players Category:South Korean sportspeople
title: Kim Kyung-roul
